paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct two families C*(m) and (C) over tilde*(m) of ternary (2(m), 3(m), 2(m-1)) and (2(m), 3(m+1), 2(m-1)) codes, for m = 1,2,3, ... , derived from the corresponding families of modified ternary Jacket matrices. These codes are close to the Plotkin bound and have a very easy decoding procedure.
paper_title: Ternary Codes from Modified Jacket Matrices
